Header: Suspect arrested with 5,000 rupee counterfeit notes
Content: A suspect has been taken into custody along with 13 counterfeit notes of the 5,000 rupee denomination. The arrest was made in the Pettah area. The Police arrested the suspects from Bastian Mawatha based on a tip off received from a bus conductor. The bus conductor had informed the Police over the suspicious note, when the suspect tried to change a 5,000 rupee counterfeit note from him. Accordingly the Police apprehended the suspect with thirteen 5,000 rupee counterfeit notes. The 39-year-old suspect is a resident of Ampara. The suspect has been handed over to the CID for further investigations.
